contentrichtext.text: '''To Mega Therion''' or '''Τὸ Μεγα Θηρίον''' may refer to: <!-- {{wikt|To Mega Therion |Τὸ Μεγα Θηρίον}} --> * [[The Beast (Revelation)|The Beast (''Revelation'')]] in the Christian ''Bible'' * [[Aleister Crowley]] (1875–1947), British religious leader '''Music''': * [[To Mega Therion (album)|''To Mega Therion'' (album)]] by band Celtic Frost * "To Mega Therion", song in [[Theli (album)|''Theli'' (album)]] by band Therion * "To Mega Therion", song in ''Enter Now the World'' by band [[In Slaughter Natives]] == See also == * Tomegatherion, character [[Body Harvest#Tomegatherion|in plot of game ''Body Harvest'']] * Megatherion, a.k.a. [[Therion (band)]] * [[Megatherium]] * [[Therion (disambiguation)]] {{Disambig}}
